archimate:Requirement.name: SC.2.1.1: An approach should be developed for managing the secure acquisition, development and use of cloud services, which may include establishing a specific cloud security governance framework to address the unique features of a cloud environment (e.g. a cloud security-specific steering committee, policy, risk assessment and assurance process).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
